text:
GAP1-related intellectual disability is a relatively common form of cognitive impairment. It is estimated to account for 1 to 2 percent of intellectual disability cases.,GHR,SYNGAP1-related intellectual disability
What are the genetic changes related to SYNGAP1-related intellectual disability ?,"SYNGAP1-related intellectual disability is caused by mutations in the SYNGAP1 gene. The protein produced from this gene, called SynGAP, plays an important role in nerve cells in the brain. It is found at
